Yep, I am forwarding the discussion to slime.  I plan on giving most 
topics one entire week before moving on (there are a couple of topics 
which I plan letting discussion go on for longer).  I do ask that you 
do break up comments on slime, according to the size.

Small Slime

Medium Slime

Large Slime

As expected, I am going to wait for a few replies before issuing my 
own comments/complaints/suggestions.
